Package com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver

Contins implementation of local server on Raspberry Pi.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthFilter
    Servlet Filter implementation class AuthFilter Filters users upon their authenticity.
    ChangePasswordPage
    Managed bean for change password page.
    IndexPage
    Class implements a managed bean for the index page of the application.
    NewUserPage
    Class implements a managed bean for the page where new user is set.
    PageNames
    Class with constants of names for HTML pages.
    RpiLocalRequestProcessor
    Class implements RequestProcessor interface according to this servlet's REST API.
    RpiServlet
    Servlet implementation class RpiServlet.
    UserBean
    Class implements a user bean for users with registered chip tokens.
    UserConfigManager
    Reader and writer for the user configuration file in JSON format.
    UserPage
    Class implements a managed bean for the page with user management logic.

Package com.kuryshee.safehome.rpiserver Description

Implementation of local server on Raspberry Pi. Package contains beans for HTML pages and implementation of servlet for communication with Raspberry Pi RpiServlet. It has an implementation of Filter to prevent accessing pages for unauthorized users. The server shares information about users with Raspberry Pi application via UserConfigManager.
Author:
Ekaterina Kurysheva
